template.name: Survivor
template.parameter: double r, meta int speed, meta int dv, meta int dfr

location.name: __end__
location.label: s_payoff'==0 and r_payoff'==0 and evac_time'==0 and t'==0

location.name: moving1
location.label: s_payoff'==0 and r_payoff'==0 and evac_time'==0 and t<=dist/speed

location.name: moving2
location.label: s_payoff'==0 and r_payoff'==0 and evac_time'==0 and t<=dist/speed

location.name: moving4
location.label: s_payoff'==0 and r_payoff'==0 and evac_time'==0 and t<=dist/speed

location.name: moving3
location.label: s_payoff'==0 and r_payoff'==0 and evac_time'==0 and t<=dist/speed

query.formula: simulate[<=50]{s.GI, s.NOT_GI, t, evac_time, s.dist/s.speed, s.__end__}
